name: Mandi's Tea Party
description:
When a rich little girl named Mandi pays off your good-for-nothing parents to give you to her as her new "Dolly," you have three days to appease her and be the best paid friend a girl could ask for at just 8 years old.

This demo includes:

  • 3 Endings
  • 2 Custom CGs
  • Custom Title And Background music
  • ≈5000 words

Content warnings: 

Verbal Abuse, Mentions of Child Neglect, Violence against Children, Descriptions of Violent Acts against Children, Mentions of Death, Mentions of Blood, Mentions of Knives, Mild Disturbing Imagery, and Dangerous Situations Involving Children.

How to play:

Simply download the file for your respective device, unzip the file, and double-click MandisTeaParty!
